title: Shipping Info Entered Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.shipping_info_entered event. Fired when a user submits shipping information during checkout.

orderId.description: The order or transaction identifier, if available.

shippingMethod.description: The shipping method selected by the user (e.g. 'ground', 'two_day', 'overnight').

total.description: The total monetary value of the order.

shippingCost.description: The shipping cost for the order.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

products.description: The list of products included in the order.

estimatedDelivery.description: The estimated delivery date in ISO 8601 format.

postalCode.description: The destination postal or ZIP code.
